Àtụ:Album ratingsCarnival III: The Fall and Rise of a Refugee bụ nke asatọ studio-album nke onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na onye rapper Wyclef Jean
A wepụrụtara ya na Septemba 15, n'afọ 2017.

Na June 22, n'afọ 2017, Jean wepụtara egwu mbụ site na abọm ahụ, nke akpọrọ "Fela Kuti", tinyere egwu ọzọ, nke akpụrụ "What Happened to Love". Na Julaị 14, n'afọ 2017, Wyclef wepụtara "Fela Kuti" vidiyo abụ.
Mai Perkins nke Pop Magazine dere na nyocha dị mma, "Carnival 3 ziri ezi n'oge
Edere egwu Wyclefī na-eto eto na ike na ntachi obi
Abọm ahụ bụ ọrụ dị mkpirikpi nke nwere ọtụtụ atụmatụ na otuto nye ndị dị ka Fela Kuti yana akara nke hip-hop
" Maazị Wavvy nke Cult MTL nyere nkatọ na-adịghị mma, na-akọwa abọm ahụ dị ka "ihe dị ọnụ ala nke nostalgia cash-in".
Na Disemba 25, n'afọ 2017, Jean kwupụtara The Carnival Tour na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta. Ọ malitere na Febụwarị 9, n'afọ 2018, wee gwụ na Ọktoba 26, n'afọ 2018, mgbe mememe iri ise na isee gosipụtara.
